definition: to deliver a punishing attack/to deal a heavy blow
to deliver a frontal assault/to meet head-on (idiom)

sentences.english: We will begin the painful shock experiment in a moment.
sentences.chinese: 馬上我們將要開始一個痛擊實驗。

sentences.english: He seems to prefer intellectual counteroffensives to decrees and crackdowns.
sentences.chinese: 他似乎更傾向於用知性的反擊來判決和痛擊對手。

sentences.english: And a big theme for European far-right parties is Muslim-bashing.
sentences.chinese: 並且歐洲極右政黨的一個重大議題便是痛擊穆斯林。

sentences.english: And two goals from Eduardo Salvio helped Benfica to a 4-1 home win against PSV Eindhoven.
sentences.chinese: 薩維奧獨中兩元幫助本菲卡主場4:1痛擊埃因霍溫。

sentences.english: However, after 308 general election, BN had beated badly.
sentences.chinese: 然而，308大選之後，國陣遭到了痛擊。

sentences.english: The Federals kept on coming long past the point where all the pleasure of whipping them vanished.
sentences.chinese: 迎頭痛擊的樂趣早已消失，北軍仍在衝鋒。

sentences.english: I found the idea of Baba clobbering a thief both exhilarating and terribly frightening.
sentences.chinese: 我發現爸爸痛擊竊賊這個主意讓我既興奮又害怕。

sentences.english: Montgomery urged his troops to knock Rommel for six out of Africa.
sentences.chinese: 蒙哥利馬激勵他的軍隊痛擊隆美爾，把他趕出非洲。

sentences.english: Speculators fearing a crackdown might want to use the time they have left to sell short.
sentences.chinese: 害怕痛擊的投機分子也許會利用剩餘的時間去拋空。

sentences.english: They made head against the enemy.
Tomorrow we're gonna pecker-slap those Globo Gym bastards.
sentences.chinese: 明天我們要痛擊那些全球健身中心隊的私生子們。

sentences.english: Smith peppered his opponent with long right.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯用右手長拳痛擊對手。

sentences.english: We gave the intruders a hot welcome .
sentences.chinese: 我們給予侵略者迎頭痛擊。

sentences.english: He treated the strategy of the hostile general like a citadel, and made a breach in it.
sentences.chinese: 他把敵軍將領的戰略，看成一個堡壘，加以迎頭痛擊。

sentences.english: The Democratic former law professor is trouncing the ex-pilot in sales of action figures.
sentences.chinese: 民主黨前法律教授是痛擊前的銷售試點行動的數字。

sentences.english: If the enemy dares to invade us, we'll deal them head-on blows.
sentences.chinese: 敵人膽敢進犯，我們就給予迎頭痛擊。

definition: to be a cinch/in the bag/(of a person) confident of success
the critical moment/life and death crisis
man behind the mirror/puppet master/string puller
to uphold virtue and condemn evil (idiom)
to run a newspaper/to publish a newspaper
see 臨陣退縮|临阵退缩[lin2 zhen4 tui4 suo1]
lit. a thunder of dragons without a head/fig. a group lacking a leader
